title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Alcatraz Cruises
hours: Cruises start at 9AM and continue throughout the day. Ten to 14 daily departures depending on the time of year. Evening tours offered Thursdays-Mondays
price: Adults from $26, Children from $16, Seniors from $24.50
content: Information on the island can be found on the [http://www.nps.gov/archive/alcatraz National Park Service's website].
